data.comment: Guus Hupperts puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 8, Great play from Giorgos Giakoumakis to set up the goal.
Danny Post (Venlo) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The first-half is over at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Covebo Stadion - De Koel.
Goal! Sean Klaiber levels the match at 1-1.
Mimoun Mahi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 68, Tristan Dekker is on a sub for Guus Hupperts for Venlo.
Utrecht make their first substitution with Daniel Arzani replacing Gyrano Kerk.
Vito Van Crooij (Venlo) has received a yellow card from Rob Dieperink.
In the minute 79, Giorgos Giakoumakis, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Jafar Arias is the substitute for Venlo.
The away team replace Joris Overeem with Othman Boussaid.
Eljero Elia is replacing Mimoun Mahi for the away team.
Rob Dieperink blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
